department.name: Computer Science and Engineering
department.vision: To be a center of excellence in computer science education and research
department.mission: To produce competent computer science professionals and contribute to technological advancement

contact.office: Department of CSE, NIT Rourkela, Odisha 769008

btech.name: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
btech.eligibility: JEE Main qualified candidates applied through JoSAA/CSAB counseling with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics in 10+2

mtech.name: Master of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

specializations.name: Computer Science
specializations.description: To produce computer professionals with ability to analyze and solve complex computer engineering problems

specializations.name: Information Security
specializations.description: To produce competent graduates to analyze the security challenges and suggest suitable design solutions

specializations.name: Software Engineering
specializations.description: To produce competent graduates to analyze the software engineering challenges and suggest suitable design solutions

mtech.eligibility: GATE qualified and admission through CCMT counseling  or sponsored candidates with BE/BTech in CSE/IT

Laboratory_Details.Laboratory: Image Processing and Clustered Computing Laboratory
Equipment: Scanner, Digital Camera, Image Processing Hardware System
HPC Cluster consists of 1 Master Node and 3 Compute Nodes which is based on Intel Platform with a Gigabit Ethernet Back-plane, Benchmark with High Performance Linpack (HPL): 11GFlops
